channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: SCOTUS allows dismantling of Education Dept. And, Trump threatens Russia with tariffs
item.description: The Supreme Court has cleared the way for the Trump administration to continue with mass firings. And, Trump has threatened Russia with tariffs over its war with Ukraine.
item.content:encoded:
The Supreme Court has cleared the way for the Trump administration to continue with mass firings. And, Trump has threatened Russia with tariffs over its war with Ukraine.

(Image credit: JIM WATSON/AFP via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: Planet Money Summer School tackles political economy
item.description: In this season of Planet Money Summer School, our free economics course for your ears is tackling the biggest economic player of them all: the government.
item.content:encoded: In this season of Planet Money Summer School, our free economics course for your ears is tackling the biggest economic player of them all: the government.
item.dc:creator: Planet Money staff

item.title: A million veterans gave DNA for medical research. Now the data is in limbo
item.description: Retired service members donated genetic material to a DNA database to help answer health questions for all Americans. The Trump administration is dragging its heels on agreements to analyze the data.
item.content:encoded:
Retired service members donated genetic material to a DNA database to help answer health questions for all Americans. The Trump administration is dragging its heels on agreements to analyze the data.

(Image credit: Billy Schuerman/Virginian Pilot/Tribune News Service)
item.dc:creator: Darius Tahir

item.title: 4 astronauts splashdown on SpaceX capsule to end Axiom Space's private Ax-4 mission
item.description: The private crew included Ax-4 mission commander and former NASA astronaut Peggy Whitson. It was her fifth trip to space and extended her record-setting duration to 695 days, the most of any American.
item.content:encoded:
The private crew included Ax-4 mission commander and former NASA astronaut Peggy Whitson. It was her fifth trip to space and extended her record-setting duration to 695 days, the most of any American.

(Image credit: AP)
item.dc:creator: Russell Lewis

item.title: Heavy rains and flash flooding sweep across Northeast
item.description: Flash flood watches and warnings were in place in parts of New Jersey, New York, Pennsylvania and surrounding areas as downpours moved through the region.
item.content:encoded:
Flash flood watches and warnings were in place in parts of New Jersey, New York, Pennsylvania and surrounding areas as downpours moved through the region.

(Image credit: AP)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Thousands continue search for those missing following deadly floods in central Texas
item.description: Recent storms have slowed recovery efforts in central Texas following the July 4 floods that killed more than 130 people. About 14,000 volunteers are searching for at least 100 people still missing.
item.content:encoded: Recent storms have slowed recovery efforts in central Texas following the July 4 floods that killed more than 130 people. About 14,000 volunteers are searching for at least 100 people still missing.
item.dc:creator: Steve Inskeep

item.title: Wildfire destroys historic Grand Canyon Lodge
item.description: Arizona's governor is demanding answers about how the National Park Service handled a wildfire burning out of control in Grand Canyon National Park. The fire destroyed a historic lodge there.
item.content:encoded: Arizona's governor is demanding answers about how the National Park Service handled a wildfire burning out of control in Grand Canyon National Park. The fire destroyed a historic lodge there.
item.dc:creator: Adrian Skabelund

item.title: Why there's so much excitement around a cryptocurrency called stablecoin
item.description: Stablecoins are meant to be a safer type of cryptocurrency. Now, Congress is preparing some rules around it.
item.content:encoded:
Stablecoins are meant to be a safer type of cryptocurrency. Now, Congress is preparing some rules around it.

(Image credit: Justin Tallis)
item.dc:creator: Rafael Nam

item.title: Republicans renew a bid to remove noncitizens from the census tally behind voting maps
item.description: GOP lawmakers are trying again to exclude millions of non-U.S. citizens living in the states from census counts that the 14th Amendment says must include the "whole number of persons in each state."
item.content:encoded:
GOP lawmakers are trying again to exclude millions of non-U.S. citizens living in the states from census counts that the 14th Amendment says must include the "whole number of persons in each state."

(Image credit: Jacquelyn Martin)
item.dc:creator: Hansi Lo Wang

item.title: Her love life was in chaos. The solution? Giving up sex
item.description: After a bad breakup, writer Melissa Febos decided to abstain from sex and dating for a year. She didn't realize how much it would change her life. She tells her story in a new book, The Dry Season.
item.content:encoded: After a bad breakup, writer Melissa Febos decided to abstain from sex and dating for a year. She didn't realize how much it would change her life. She tells her story in a new book, The Dry Season.
item.dc:creator: Marielle Segarra
